I hereby certify that the aforementioned determinations were issued during the month of December, 1993. Copies of these determinations are available for inspection in room C-4318, U.S. Department of Labor, 200 Constitution Avenue, NW, Washington, DC 20210 during normal business hours or will be mailed to persons to write to the above address.
Dated: January 3, 1994.

signjob.textblock: Director, Office of Trade Adjustment Assistance.
